creator: ragaller@apache.org
text:
The Email Validation Routine in ItemUtil.java has a regex that does not respect
«-» signs in Email-Adresses. 

Maybe this is a possible regex to use:
^[_A-Za-z0-9-]+(\\.[_A-Za-z0-9-]+)*@[A-Za-z0-9-]+(\\.[A-Za-z0-9-]+)*$

A full featured email validation class is found at:
http://www.leshazlewood.com/?p=23
